Multiple Russian Geran-2 drones hit a target at the industrial zone in northern Chernihiv City last night. A fire could be seen burning from the rest of the city. 
No additional details were published by officials.

Multiple Russian Geran-2 drones hit a target at the industrial zone in northern Chernihiv City last night. A fire could be seen burning from the rest of the city. 
No additional details were published by officials.

Multiple Russian Geran-2 drones hit a target at the industrial zone in northern Chernihiv City last night. A fire could be seen burning from the rest of the city.   No additional details were published by officials.
Additionally, at least 4 Gerans struck a target in the area of Slavutych, Kyiv Oblast during the night. There is currently no information on what was hit.

In the Pokrovsk direction, Russian forces continued to advance southeast of Myrnohrad, and have captured two new villages.
In the southeast, Russian forces continued advancing south through the village of Kozatske, and captured the rest of its houses. From there, they began advancing south down the treelines towards Promin, which the Ukrainians withdrew from to prevent being encircled. This allowed for Russia to seize the positions east and south of Promin, as well as the village itself. 
Attacks were then carried out towards Myrnohrad, where Russian soldiers managed to infiltrate into the first houses of the southeastern streets from the direction of Kozatske. Additionally, they captured the treeline southwest of Balahan, widening their spearhead into Myrnohrad from this direction. 
+ ~6.40 km¬≤ in favour of Russia.
KAB glide-bomb(s) launched from a Su-34 are flying towards Kharkiv City.
KAB glide-bomb(s) launched from a Su-34 are flying towards Kharkiv City.
Approaching the city from the north.
Explosions were heard in Kharkiv
Explosions were heard in Kharkiv
Two KABs targeted the industrial district of the city
2 more KABs are approaching Kharkiv from the north.
2 more KABs are approaching Kharkiv from the north.

All four KABs struck the industrial district of Kharkiv
Kherson City came under combined attack from Russian Geran-2 drones and MLRS last night. At least 3 Gerans impacted the Dniprovskyi District of the city, while MLRS struck the Korabelnyi District.
Aftermath of the Russian MLRS strikes on Kherson today.
All four KABs struck the industrial district of Kharkiv
A Russian reconnaissance drone is operating over the northern suburbs of Kharkiv, adjusting the KAB strikes.
More from the strikes on Kharkiv
More from the strikes on Kharkiv
For the second time this week, a Russian BM-35 drone struck a wind turbine in Kramatorsk, Donetsk Oblast. No new power outages are reported.
For the second time this week, a Russian BM-35 drone struck a wind turbine in Kramatorsk, Donetsk Oblast. No new power outages are reported.

Russian forces have captured the village of Zlahoda, Hulyaipole direction, Zaporizhzhia Oblast. 
Pre-war population: ~109.
Total land area: ~0.68 km¬≤.
Military Situation In Ukraine On October 23, 2025 (Maps Update)
Military Situation In Ukraine On October 23, 2025 (Maps Update)

Russian Army Strikes Crossings On Siverskyi Donets River As It Approaches Krasny Liman 
On October 23, the Russian military approached the key city of Krasny Liman in the Donetsk direction, and struck several Ukrainian crossings on the nearby Siverskyi Donets River.
To the northeast of Krasny Liman, the Yug [South] Group of Forces reached Stavky. Fierce fighting with Kiev forces is now reportedly taking place inside the settlement. Russian troops also advanced towards the city from the east, capturing a large swath of land to the west of Zarichne in recent days.
‚ÄúThe Russian Armed Forces have straightened the engagement line and improved their tactical position in the Stavky-Kirovsk sector of the Krasny Liman direction in the Donetsk People‚Äôs Republic. Ukrainian militants continue holding on to the strategic heights near Stavky despite casualties,‚Äù military expert Andrey Marochko told TASS.
üëâ

The Siege Of Krasny Lyman In Ukraine: Russian Army Tightens The Noose Around The City
Russian units have disrupted Ukrainian logistics near the Drobyshevo settlement on the Krasny Lyman axis. The Ukrainian command is transferring reserves south of Vovchansk. 
Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orb√°n has sharply criticized the European Union‚Äôs policy towards Ukraine.

Russia Continues Strikes On Ukraine's Power System. The West And Kyiv Announce New Anti-Russian Sanctions
On October 22-23, the conflict between Russia and Ukraine continued with mutual strikes, although their intensity was lower than in previous days. According to the Ukrainian Air Force, the Russian side used 130 UAVs, 92 of which were claimed to have been shot down. 
Donald Trump announced he was scrapping the idea of a Budapest summit with Vladimir Putin, describing the decision as a tactical pause rather than a complete breakdown in dialogue. A key point was that this statement came after Rutte presented him with a European-Ukrainian 12-point "peace plan," which included a ceasefire along the current lines, security guarantees for Ukraine, a path to EU membership, and increased economic pressure on Moscow.¬†Analysts note that Trump's team likely concluded that arriving at a meeting with Putin with a plan that Moscow had already preemptively rejected would be a futile endeavor.
üëâ

On October 22-23, the conflict between Russia and Ukraine continued with mutual strikes, although their intensity was lower than in previous days. According to the Ukrainian Air Force, the Russian side used 130 UAVs, 92 of which were claimed to have been shot down. 
Donald Trump announced he was scrapping the idea of a Budapest summit with Vladimir Putin, describing the decision as a tactical pause rather than a complete breakdown in dialogue. A key point was that this statement came after Rutte presented him with a European-Ukrainian 12-point "peace plan," which included a ceasefire along the current lines, security guarantees for Ukraine, a path to EU membership, and increased economic pressure on Moscow.¬†Analysts note that Trump's team likely concluded that arriving at a meeting with Putin with a plan that Moscow had already preemptively rejected would be a futile endeavor.
